transcript.speaker: Clinician
transcript.text: Have you had any health concerns since I saw you last year?

transcript.speaker: Patient
transcript.text: No, I feel great. Just got over a cold last month, but it wasn't bad.

transcript.speaker: Clinician
transcript.text: You're 5'7" and 135 pounds. Blood pressure is 110/70. Heart rate is 62.

transcript.speaker: Clinician
transcript.text: You're due for a Tdap booster and this year's flu shot. I'll get those prescribed for you.

result.information: Height: 5'7", Weight: 135 pounds, Blood pressure: 110/70, Heart rate: 62
